sections.heading: library; property; exemption from execution and taxation; when
sections.text: The property of any public library shall be exempt from execution and shall be exempt from taxation to the extent it is used for a public purpose.SourceLaws 1911, c. 73, ยง 12, p. 317;R.S.1913, ยง 3803;C.S.1922, ยง 3196;C.S.1929, ยง 51-212;R
